name: Heroes of the Dungeon
description: Take the battle to the dungeons as you explore and collect all the loot for you to keep and brag about your score. Choose between 4 heroes, Paladin, Mage, Ranger, and Berserker with different weapons that you can use in battle. Fight between dragons and head monsters as you navigate and get to the teleporters of the dungeon. Collect potions along the way to gain health or a movement speed boost to get an advantage on the enemies!
